dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT DISTINCT i.item_xid item, i.description item_xid, glogowner.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_ship_ref_num_fcn(sh.shipment_gid,'CUSTOMER PO RELEASE NUMBER') po_number, shipment_xid, TO_CHAR(sh.end_time,'MM/DD/YYYY') delivery_date, glogowner.XXSCOU_UTILITY_PKG.xxscou_get_item_rem_txt_fcn(i.item_gid,'NAP COA ADDITIONAL NOTES') additional_notes FROM shipment sh, shipment_stop_d ssd, s_ship_unit_line ssul, packaged_item pki, item i WHERE 1 = 1 AND sh.shipment_gid = ssd.shipment_gid AND ssd.stop_num = 1 AND ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssul.packaged_item_gid = pki.packaged_item_gid AND pki.item_gid = i.item_gid AND sh.shipment_gid = :P_SHIPMENT_GID
SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM document doc, document_content doc_con WHERE doc.document_gid = doc_con.document_content_gid AND document_xid = :item || '_COA'
SELECT blob_content image1 FROM document doc, document_content doc_con WHERE doc.document_gid = doc_con.document_content_gid AND document_xid = :item || '_COA'
SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'FMDay, Month DD, yyyy ')) curr_date FROM DUAL
